From the brand

High Quality Car Cleaning Kit

You don’t need to waste time looking for a separate cleaning tool. Make your cleaning easier, faster and more efficient.

Car Detailing Cleaning Kit

【COMPLETE CAR INTERIOR CLEANING KIT】The car Interior detailing supplies kit includes car vacuum*1,cleaning gel*1, windshield cleaning tool*1,replaceable microfiber pads*2, 100ml spray bottle*1, car detailing brushes*5, car dash duster brush*1, air vents brush*2, microfiber towels*2, durable tool storage bag*1.You don’t need to waste time looking for a separate cleaning tool. Make your cleaning easier, faster and more efficient.
【STRONG SUCTION AND BRIGHT LED LIGHT】Car vacuum cleaner adopt 120W power motor, can provide almost 7500Pa ultra-strong suction, which allows to easily pick up dirt, crumbs, and pet hair from the car with outstanding cleaning performance.This handheld vacuum features a bright LED Light which is helpful for the dark cleaning and corner cleaning.Vacuum cleaner cord is 16.4 feet long and comes with 4 accessories (auxiliary connector, long nozzle, brush nozzle, extension hose).
【CAR INTERIOR CARE KIT】 Car cleaning gel, dashboard dust brush, microfiber towels and air outlet brushes can be used with car vacuum cleaner to remove dust from the surface of the car. Car windshield cleaning tool is designed with an extended handle and a rotatable triangular head, which is convenient for cleaning the bottom of the window or some difficult-to-clean areas. 5 different sizes of premium detail brushes make it easy to explore tight spaces, lug nuts and any other hard-to-reach areas.
【PREMIUM MATERIAL & HUMANIZED DESIGN】These car cleaning supplies are made from fine material to be soft,sturdy and durable.Absolutely safe to clean on delicate surfaces. The car cleaning kit is ergonomically designed and will not cause fatigue to your hands or arms after long hours of work.All car cleaning kit tools are packed in an Oxford bag, which is very convenient and space-saving. You can place it anywhere in the trunk or back seat.
【PERFECT GIFT FOR CAR LOVERS】: Say goodbye to the constant hassle of removing dust, dirt or stubborn stains with the Lezcufer car cleaning Interior detailing kit, designed for car interior use! It can be a great gift for any car buffs or new car owners.Make car cleaning to become a simple thing. 

Car Detailing Kit

Say goodbye to the constant hassle of removing dust, dirt or stubborn stains with the Lezcufer car cleaning Interior detailing kit, designed for carinterior and exterior use. The professional choice for car lovers! It can be a great gift for any car buffs or new car owners.

COMPLETE CAR INTERIOR CLEANING KIT

You don’t need to waste time looking for a separate cleaning tool. All car cleaning kit tools are packed in an Oxford bag, which is very convenient and space-saving. Make your cleaning easier, faster and more efficient.

includes： car vacuum*1,cleaning gel*1, windshield cleaning tool*1,replaceable microfiber pads*2, 100ml spray bottle*1, car detailing brushes*5, car dash duster brush*1, air vents brush*2, microfiber towels*2, durable tool storage bag*1.

Read more

High Quality Motor

Our car vacuum cleaner adopts 120W/12V high-power motor with a strong suction power of up to 7500PA, the noise is controlled below 70DB, it can be used both wet and dry, which easily remove dust, sand, paper debris, hair, food scraps or spilled liquids.

Significant-Efficiency Cleaning

Using high-quality, durable ABS, the suction is stable and the noise is low. Washable, reusable HEPA filter, greener and more durable. Strong suction, while improving cleaning efficiency, it can meet the needs of deep cleaning, maximize the effect, save time and effort.

Unique LED Light Design

Built-in bright LED lights provide great visibility when you’re cleaning corners, car seat bottoms, and other hard-to-see places. Helps you clean quickly in the dark, bringing a lot of convenience to cleaning work.
